DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the pharmacokinetics, in particular the routes and extent of metabolism and excretion, of ASP1941 after a single oral dose.
DOC.criteria: Body weight between 60100kg, BMI between 18.530 kg/m2, inclusive Pulse <40 or >90 bpm; Systolic Blood Pressure > 140 mmHg; Diastolic Blood Pressure >90 mmHg
